description: Try our easy to follow Apple Crumble Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple Crumble Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stand pie for 20 minutes. Chill for at least 1 hour to firm up. Transfer to a serving plate and dust with icing sugar. Cut into wedges and serve.
